string.text: Your men on the barrier say that you're looking for a reliable person?
My men have almost dug a tunnel to the Dark Valley, but to complete the work we need dynamite. I know that it can be found in the Cordon rookie camp, can you bring it for us? You will be rewarded.
Ok, I'll look around when I get to Cordon again.
No, I've got better things to do.
Hi, I brought the dynamite.
Come on, come on, Let's see!
Here take this heavy burden off my hands, this better be worth it.
Well thank you, look what we are planning right here. Right after the login boxes do, and exit near the lake in the Dark Valley. Need be, help.
Thanks. I would be.
Hi Marked One. We've been waiting for you to bring the dynamite.
Yes. Here it is.
Well, now the guys will blow up Jumper, and we shall be free to go! Hmm, as I bent, Freedom to freely walk, MDA, In general, the place I pointed out to you, use.
Well, look what you did there.
The information on Ghost mentioned something about an unmarked road.

You have a sharp eye. But you know the old saying, you don't get something for nothing. We have been experimenting with a few rare artifacts. One in particular has been impossible for me to aquire, the Grandmothers Beads of the Burer. Surely you've heard about this artefact? Bring it to me and I will show you the trail.
I'll try to find it for you.
I'm going to the Monolith, so I don't have the time right now.
I brought you the Grandmothers Beads of the Burer.
You've got to be kidding me. Let me see it!!
Here, take it.

Amazing! simply amazing! Ok, here's the trail.\nI will mark it on your map, from Agroprom leading straight here. See? \nHowever; I don't know the way back. There is evidence that the Military, at Agroprom, have documents that show the location of the road. But the case with the documents has gone missing. Do you think you could find them for me?
Are these documents still in the vicinity of Agroprom?
They are not in the Military Base, but they can't be very far from it, either.
I will find them for you, don't worry.
No, Im going to make my way to the Monolith.
That's great news!! I will await your return.
Well, there will still be time, come back as soon as you can.
I brought you the documents.
Let's see what you have brought.
Here, take a look.
Yes, this was exactly what we were looking for. This gives the location of the path from here to Agroprom.
Thank you, Professor!
Mongol
Core
Good Master, do you perform repairs?
Yes, but I warn you, it's not cheap. The more wear, the more expensive it will be. Let's see what needs fixing, \n.\nThe list of possible repairs:
Repair my sidearm.
Repair my primary weapon.
Repair my Armour.
Damn, money strained. Please try later.
Schas, all at once will make,... \n.\nDone, take!
Yes, Marked One, cool you tapped. So... Somewhere I had armored... Oh there they are... Like that! Yeah... Ugh. \n.\nGet like brand new!
Hmm. Excellent work. Hey, where are you pricked? Silent? Well, all right.
Excellent work, well worth the money!!
Can you fix something else for me?
Come on, do it. \n.\nThe list of possible repairs:
Lanky
Associate
Loner

Such a weapon is usually only found on heavily armed detachments of Military STALKERs ... Extremely rare because of it's large size and weight. Requires the use of Exoskeleton armour due to it's large size, as it must be strapped on, and attached to the users armour. 
The original PK Pulemyot Kalashnikova or Kalashnikovs Machinegun was a development of Kalashnikovs automatic rifle design, firing the 7.62x54mmR Eastern Bloc standard ammunition originally from the Mosin-Nagant. It is equipped with a simple bipod and is designed as a squad-level support weapon; it is also suitable for installation and vehicle mounting. The PK machine gun can be used as a light anti-aircraft weapon when it is put on an AA mount. Most are belt-fed, using linked 25 round belts. These 25-round belts can be linked to any length necessary. Typical of Soviet machine guns, the standard model feeds from the right and ejects it's spent cases via an ejection port on the left side of the weapon, contrary to the right side ejection port seen in most Western machine guns.
The PKM Kalashnikovs Machine-gun Modernized is the current model. It is a modernized, product-improved version of the PK weighing only 7.5 kg without ammunition
PKM Pulemyot Kalashnikova

Regular sniper cartridge for the SVD, SVU-AS rifles and PKM machine gun. Box with 100 or 250 bullets on the ribbon for manual version of PKM machine gun.\n Despite the fact that the 7N1 adopted in 1967, it is two to three times the modern gross 7N13 in terms of dispersion. However, due to the use of blunt stamped steel core 10, the shell does not have the bullet high breakdown properties.

Ammunition: 5.7x28mm FN SS190 \n.\nThe FN P90 is a selective fire personal defense weapon (PDW) designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. The P90s name is an abbreviation of FNs Project 9.0 - the weapon was created in response to NATO requests for a replacement for 9x19mm Parabellum firearms. It was designed as a compact but powerful firearm for vehicle drivers, operators of crew-served weapons, support personnel, special forces and counter-terrorist groups. The P90 has a futuristic appearance. It features a compact bullpup design and ambidextrous controls, and incorporates several innovations such as the top-mounted magazine and FNs high velocity 5.7x28mm ammunition. The P90 was developed between 1986 and 1990. A P90 TR variant was then introduced in 1999, featuring a triple rail interface system for mounting accessories. Since 2005, the P90 has also been offered to civilian shooters as the PS90, a semi-automatic sporting model with a lengthened barrel
FN P90

The 5.7x28mm cartridge is a small caliber, high velocity cartridge created by FN Herstal in Belgium in conjunction with the FN P90 personal defense weapon (PDW) and FN Five-seven pistol. Developed in response to NATO requests for a replacement for 9x19mm Parabellum, the 5.7x28mm is a bottlenecked centerfire cartridge that is somewhat similar to the .22 Hornet or .22 K-Hornet.
Ensign Sherstuk
Repair-kit for field repairs of body armour and other equipment.
Remnabor RIA
Repair-kit for weapon field repairs.
Remnabor RIW
Box for Repair-kits.
Tool Box
Saiga 12C

"Saiga-12C" automatic shotgun. It is used as an assault weapon for close combat operations. Recommended as a reliable and accurate weapon. It is reloaded automatically due to the energy of powder combustion gases bled from the barrel bore through the barrel port. The shotgun may be equipped with a sight leaf adjustable for windage and elevation, which makes zeroing and firing at moving targets more convenient. 
Ammunition: 
12x70 buckshot, 
12x76 slug, 
12x76 dart.

Armour-piercing ammunition for automatic AK-47, AKM, AK-103, and AK-104. Improved armor-piercing capabilities.From the Barnaul plant(headstamp 17), Ulanovsk plant (headstamp 3) and the Soviet State Factory at Lugansk, Ukraine (headstamp 270). This ammo is hardened AP not soft filler steel like some other steel core. This ammo is rare in itself ...

Standard cartridge for automatic AK-47, AKM, AK-103, and AK-104. The cartridge produces significant wounding (including remote wounding effects known as hydrostatic shock) in cases where the bullet tumbles and fragments in tissue, but produces relatively minor wounds in cases where the bullet exits before beginning to yaw.

Kalashnikov model 1947 chambered for 7.62x39mm ammunition. It is a simple and reliable weapon, although the cheapness in the production of so many affected the overall useability and accuracy. In the Zone is a fairly rare weapon because of it's lack in service with the army. 
Ammunition: 
7.62x39mm fmj 
7.62x39mm AP
PDA
PDA
MIL PDA
MIL PDA

A personal digital assistant (PDA), also known as a palmtop computer, is a mobile device that functions as a personal information manager. A PDA has an electronic visual display, enabling it to include a web browser, but some newer models also have audio capabilities, enabling them to be used as mobile phones or portable media players. Many can access the Internet, intranets or extranets via Wi-Fi or Wireless Wide Area Networks.

A military (PDA), also known as a palmtop computer, is a mobile device that functions as a personal information manager. A PDA has an electronic visual display, enabling it to include a web browser, but some newer models also have audio capabilities, enabling them to be used as mobile phones or portable media players. Many can access the Internet, intranets or extranets via Wi-Fi or Wireless Wide Area Networks.
Supergauss canister
High Energy Capacitor with ready-killer element in store for gauss-pistol. It has enormous destructive power. The energy source is an encapsulated piece of the Artefact "Moonlight".
Strelok's PDA
The PDA belonging to Strelok ... contains a lot of information, but unfortunately almost all of it is in some sort of strange, encrypted format.

Code Combinations for the doors
Syak gave me the password code to the door of a small shelter, which is located opposite the turning to Pripyat. This set of numbers is as follows: 1287975.
Information from dead Monolithian

Found documents and photos, could make out 'laboratory' and 'Limansk' but most was hard to read. There was a code which looked like '886677' but that would be a pretty stupid security code so it is probably wrong.
Transitions located

In Agroprom is the transition to the Cordon
In the Cordon is the transition to Agroprom
From Agroprom to the location of Yantar
In the swamp of Yantar is a direct path to Agroprom
From Rostock to the army warehouses
In army depots you have a direct road to the Wild Territory.
At the Research Center of Yantar you can get to the Brain Scorcher.
There is an exit from the Radar to the Dark Valley.
From the Radar is a direct road to Yantar
In the Dark Valley you have the opportunity to go to the Brain Scorcher
From the Dark Valley to the Freedom Base
Lukash reported on the presence of a passage from the Freedom Base to the Dark Valley
The Informant has sold new information on a transition from the Radar to the Army Warehouses. Huckster, made it so... And where will you go!?
Explorer in the marshes showed me a trail to the Old Village
Go to the Army Warehouses
Go to Rostock
Go to Chernobyl

There is a class of anomalies, the effect of which is beyond any comprehension... An example is the anomaly STALKERs know among each other as the Jumper. This anomaly has an infinitely small period of time that you can throw anything in it and it travels great distances, with the object inside does not experience any physical overload. It is rumored that one of those anomalies that can teleport directly to the cherished Monolithian Base is very close to the bar - in the Army Warehouses ...

Military Troop Commander
Cordon Defense
Report
14/09/2012 at 2200 hours in the evening, roll call revealed the absence of three soldiers entrusted to my unit, located on the territory of the former Institute Agrocomplex. The survey identified the following other facts - the missing soldiers repeatedly were uncontrollable by the non-commissioned officers, attended the so-called Sidorovich, who supplied them with alcohol and drugs.
According to colleagues at the time of their patrol was discovered overlooked passage into the territory of the Cordon. Location and approach to the passage quote on the attached sketch-map. Undertaken measures to search for my missing soldiers have not brought results.
Explorer said: \nnear the vicinity of the former farm is not registered on the territory of the passage to Agroprom Institute

the Scientist in the Bunker; in gratitude for bringing him an artefact for his experiments, pointed to a completely unknown way from the former Agroprom Research Institute to a Research Laboratory in the swamps at Yantar...

According to the documents stolen from the military base at SRI Agroprom, the military planned to penetrate deep into the Zone through the newly opened path, with one section of which passes through the Research Center for X-16, which is located near the tank of scientists in the Yantar swamp.
A search of a Mercenary named Ara, found the secret scheme of the road on which the Mercenaries plan to penetrate from it's base at the factory in the Wild Territory to the area of Army Warehouses.

Skull in the interrogation of a captured mercenary (buried at coordinates specified in the attached chart) received information about the existence of a direct path to block the mercenary post at the Army Warehouses at the main base of mercenaries in the Wild Territory.

Near the body of the Scientist, who died from the effects of zombification in the Red Forest, found the area in the plans, which has moved from the X-16 Research Facility, located near the Yantar swamps, in close proximity to the Radar Antenna.

On the block as members of Monolith, who guarded the exit from the Laboratory X-16 (unfortunately, Monolith managed to blow their way out) left a thick stack of documents which, among other Scientific Data is a description of the additional outlet in the Dark Valley

Decrypted data transmitted from Sidorovich to the Barkeep reads as follows: The Military will soon make a tremendous breakthrough in the very heart of the Zone. Revealed - Psi-Emitter is in a transition from Laboratory X-16 in Yantar, with possible direct access to the ghost town of Pripyat...

During the raid, members of the squad in the duty of the district laboratory X-18, found a metal case with documents. After a partial decoding information was found, it became clear - the military are preparing a massive raid to the center of the zone. One key pathway is located in the dark valley, which leads directly to the radar system.
Lukash, leader of Freedom, passed the information about the passage from the Dark Valley right in the camp, is actively used by members of his group.
Leader of Freedom, in gratitude for services rendered and authorized to use the secret passage to Freedom camp in the Dark Valley.
Transitions located
Information is available from the Mojito in regards to a Transition that originates at the Army Depot...
The Barkeep has provided information about the location of a Transition to Rostok
Scholars Documents
Scholars Documents

"Playboy" is an American mens magazine that features photographs of nude women as well as journalism and fiction. It was founded in Chicago in 1953 by Hugh Hefner and his associates, and funded in part by a $1,000 loan from Hefner's mother. The magazine has grown into Playboy Enterprises, Inc., with a presence in nearly every medium. Playboy is one of the worlds best known brands. In addition to the flagship magazine in the United States, special nation-specific versions of Playboy are published worldwide.
Unique BCC "Vintorez"

Ammunition - 
: 9x39mm SP-6 - armor 
: 9h39mm SP-5 - sniper 
Special "Vintorez" sniper rifle designed for silent and flashless shooting. Shooting at a distance required optical (daytime) and electron-optical (of night) sights. This gun is also equipped with an integrated silencer. The peculiarity of this particular weapon is the very low wear and tear of the barrel. Rumor has it that this weapon has been enhanced by means of placing it inside an anomaly ...
Playboy Magazine

Since reaching its peak in the 1970s, "Playboy" has seen a decline in circulation and cultural relevance because of competition in the field it founded first from Penthouse, Oui (which was published as a spin-off of Playboy) and Gallery in the 1970s; later from pornographic videos; and more recently from lad mags such as Maxim, FHM, and of course the WWW. In response, Playboy has attempted to re-assert it's hold on the 18-35 male demographic through slight changes to content and focusing on issues and personalities more appropriate to it's audience.
"Playboy" collection (2006)

Flak-jacket modified with the anti-gravity artefact "Cobblestone". Allows you to carry a lot of extra equipment, while in an active state. Unfortunately as a result of this modification, it is susceptible to more damage.
"Cobblestone" Armor
I need a better weapon ... any special jobs I can do to earn one!?

One of the stalkers is in possession of a document that I really need. I will not say from where nor from who. It was quite near here that he fell into an anomaly. He survived, but the document was lost. I would have gone looking for it myself, but I can't leave these Newbies alone. Find this document, bring it to me. I'll give you an AK-74U as a reward. It is in the underpass under the railroad tracks, directly to the North. \nWill you do this for me?
Yes, if it's still in the underpass I will find it for you.
No way Wolf, I'm not going anywhere near an anomaly without protection.
Hey there Wolf, anything new happening?
Baby-sitting these Rookies, drinking bad vodka. A typical day in the Zone!
Here, I found that document for you, where's the weapon you promised?
Yes!! You're no Rookie now are you?! Here, take this gun, it's only got one full clip. \nTry to talk with Kuznetsov, he can help you with more cartridges.
\nWolf asked me to find a lost document for him in the passage-way under the railroad tracks. Promises an AK-74u for this job.
Document case. It is made of a thick, refractory material.
Military Documents

Locked metal briefcase. According to the Soldier hiding in the old trailer in the swamp, it contains data sent by the Base Commander about one of the excursions deep into the Zone. It requires a code to unlock it electronically.
Documents from the Military Base
bag of 'weed'
moisture-proof bag filled with Marijuana 'Canabis Afgani KUSH'
Max Lubero
Army Radio
Army-issue VHF radio. An older, out-dated model, but in terms of it's design, it was the model most resistant to various types of radiation throughout the Zone.
Monitoring Unit

Modern surveillance system manifests disturbances in the regular Army VHF radio. This design allows remote monitoring, and in some cases may provide a more precise tuning of the teleports that can be found throughout the Zone.
Outpost Documents
Documents found on the figures in the path.
Secret Document
Documents containing orders, and notes, what could possibly be useful within all of these jumbled papers?!
File-folder containing documents
Outlined orders of the Troop Commander from over the past six months.
File-folder containing documents
Contains important information on the current method of transforming Artefacts
Documents plus unreadable disc
PDA found at the dump, in a camp of Bandits. Among other useful information, it contains instructions on how to transmutate an Artefact.
PDA containing important information
PDA found at the dump, in a Bandit camp. Among other useful information, it contains instructions on how to transmutate an Artefact.
box of cartridges
heavy wooden box. Inside are boxes of cartridges.
Metal Box
Metal box containing a set of tools.
Safe
Fireproof, armored safe Locked with a magnetic key code. Inaccessible, without a blowtorch! Contents: - unknown
little box
Metal Box
High Security Container
Steel laboratory container designed for storage and transportation of hazardous materials. In the Zone is used for transportation of artifacts with unknown properties.
Book
scientific book. Very difficult to understand.
Notebook
Notebook filled with various scientific formulas and confusing tables.
Book
An unremarkable looking book with tattered pages protruding at the edges.
Diary
the Swamp Doctors Notebook. Judging from the contents, he was here recently!!!
Doctors Diary
Computer systems unit in the Pripyat bus. Contains important information necessary for the operation of the teleport.
Laptop
Laptop, found in Laboratory X-16. Contains detailed Seismological and Geological maps of Yantar, and surrounding areas.
Scientists PDA
Dead Pripyat scientists PDA. Contains information that attracts 'mojito'
Diplomatic documents
Laptop found in Laboratory X-18. Surprisingly, it is still in working condition. Contains data on the seismic survey conducted in the area surrounding the Army Warehouses.
Laptop containing important information.
To view: insert the Laptop into the first slot.\nPavliks laptop. Besides some boring financial records, it contains a recipe for 'Artpreobrazovaniya'.
Kruglovs device
Complex Electronic Measuring Converter
Moles PDA
PDA which belonged to the STALKER nicknamed Mole
Max Luberos PDA
Max Lubero brags that this PDA contains many secrets regarding the 'Duty' faction.
Wolfhounds PDA
Among the encrypted data, there is a description concerning the transmutation of Artefacts.
Mercenarys PDA
A Mercenary called Ara kept many secrets concerning his group, including a description of the secret passage between the Army Warehouses and the Wild Territory.
Monolith PDA (unknown)
Found a PDA near the Psi-Emitter, amongst all of the gibberish, there was an artefact transmutation recipe.
Fireproof steel case with a combination lock.\n Contents: money
Steel Case
\na STALKER nicknamed Conductor asked me to find him a good weapon. a Thunderstorm Assault Rifle should do the trick.

\nProfessor Sakharov, from the Science Lab located near the Yantar swamplands has asked me to find him a rare artefact, Grandmothers Beads of the Burer. Once delivered to him, he will show me the way to a hidden pathway.
\nProfessor Sakharov said that the Military has stolen a metal case containing documents concerning data on the study of pathways into the Zone.
\General Voronin urgently needs a metal box containing important documents, which got lost in the Dark Valley. Exactly what these documents entail is a mystery.

A leader within the Freedom ranks says that they require some dynamite. Perhaps this will help pave the way into the Dark Valley. According to Lukash, the dynamite was somewhere in the Rookie camp. Where exactly? I don't know.
\nInside the box that was taken from the Army base at Agroprom was a disk containing encrypted data that I'm told that the Bartender in the old factory at Rostock can decipher.
\nTolik asked me to bring him five blind dog's tails. He needs them in order to convert an Artefact.
Did you want to ask me something?

I recently met a seasoned STALKER, we shared a bottle, and he told me how to obtain the Meat Chunk artefact from combining two others, but that requires some blind dog's tails. I, myself was trying to get them, but as you can see, I'm barely alive. If you bring me these tails, then I will tell you the secret that was told unto me.
Okay, I'll try to get the tails for you.
Im sorry, but I can't help you.
I brought you the tails you asked for.
Well Marked One, I can't thank you enough.
Take these tails, they stink!
Wait here, I wrote down the way to use these in order to create a Meat Chunk. Though, I've not yet been able to test it, cross your fingers.
How is it that I can help you?

We control this territory, protect it against Bandits and other sources of evil. From time to time we provide swag, and useful information. As you can see, our weapons are quite archaic, but on the other hand, at least we are not short of ammunition. I need you to bring me a TOZ-34 hunting rifle, for our purposes it is the most suitable weapon. In return, I'll tell you how to transform a bad artefact into a good one.
Okay, sure, no problem, shouldn't be difficult. I think Sidorovich has one in stock.
I hope you can help me out.
Hey there, I brought you the TOZ.
Once again the Bandits are causing trouble. You came at just the right time.
Do you need my help?

They're gone for now. Wait, I promised to tell you how to get Slugs. So here: a Medusa, a Quirk, a blind dogs tail and a sausage, 300 grams, Don't laugh, I'm serious!, dropping all of this crap into the Vortex anomaly, and wait. After ten minutes you will have a Slug artefact. How about that!!!
\nPetruha, team leader. Requests you to bring him a TOZ hunting rifle, which is very useful to him in the destruction of all creatures.
Do you have any information about Artefact modification?

Yesterday, one of the local Bandits, after a strong drink, began to boast that he would be rich soon. Claiming that he can convert a Medusa into a better Artefact. Let's try it out!! If you find a Medusa, then bring it to me, and I will share his recipe with you.
Sounds interesting enough. Let's give it a try.
Sounds like Bullshit to me.
I found a Medusa for you.
Okay, let's try out this transmutation recipe of yours.
Here it is. so, how is it done?
The Bandit said to toss a Medusa, Stone Blood, a bandage, and a tin of food into the Whirligig anomaly. I'm not really sure what is supposed to happen after that, but we will soon find out!!!
\nShustry wants to try out a new transmutation that he learned of from a Bandit. In order to do this, he needs a Medusa Artefact.
\nLively wants to try out a new transmutation that he learned of from a Bandit. In order to do this, he needs a Medusa Artefact.
Hello Major, are you interested in conducting some business?

It will be my Birthday soon. So, listen up! We have plenty of food, but not enough spirits. I can't just go to a shop and buy some around here, HA!! So, if you were to bring me ten bottles of vodka, I will give you three boxes of ammunition, along with some information. We have recently detained a stalker. He swears that he can create a Crystal Medusa Prickle. I'll share this info with you when you bring me the vodka. This will be one piece of business you will not regret!!!
Interesting. I really like the sound of this.
Not interested. Sorry.
Good morning Major and a Happy Birthday to you!!!
Did you bring me the vodka!?
Yes, that's ten bottles, the real deal, don't you worry.

Well done stalker! I remembered your reward. Here are three boxes of ammo, oh, and yes, the recipe. Let us put that in your PDA. \nIf you need to approach me for some gear in the future, bring vodka! Yes, there is still some small business to offer, but that can wait until later.

\nMajor Kuznetsov can supply information about artefact transformation and supply bullets for the AK-74 in exchange for ten bottles of vodka. Besides, he promised further bargains to be had upon successful execution of a personal favor.
What kind of First-Aid kit do you need?

I'm not sure. Last time these blind dogs became even more mutated. Even the tiniest of cuts could mean the end! So you have to immediately disinfect and cut out the piece of contaminated flesh.\nIf you are up to it, then bring me a dozen First-Aid kits. Then I will give you another artefact recipe.
Okay, I will get them for you, Ahhh, the ZONE! The deeper in, the worse it gets!
Sorry Fox, I need to move on, you are on your own.
Fox, I have brought you the ten kits as promised.
You brought me Army Med-Kits? Correct?
No, regular kits, I didn't bring any Army kits.
Thanks all the same. Here's the recipe, in the Elektra anomaly throw a Stone Blood, a Medusa, a dog's tail, and pour in one litre of vodka. After ten or fifteen minutes you will get a Fireball!!!
Fox needs at least ten Med-Kits.
And where is my thanks?! Count how many times I have brought you back from the dead.

Yes, you did rescue me, forgive my immodesty, but I see you're an experienced stalker, A craftsman has converted an MP5 submachine gun to use a heavier cartridge.
